name: PollinatorGarden
description:
Build a garden fit for a bee! 

🌻🌼🐝🌼🌻

In Pollinator Garden, the goal is to build your pollinator garden - a flower garden dedicated to attracting pollinators like bees - to in turn build up your resident bee colony. 

This is a submission for the GDevelop Game Jam #1, with the theme of "build/rebuild." 

Everything in the game was created within the timeframe of the game jam, with the exception of the font I used (that I got off of Google Fonts and is called "Architect's Daughter"). 

This is a prototype! There are bits that I wasn't able to implement during the jam that I'd like to come back to once the rating period ends. (Specifically, making a sprout sprite for each plant to simulate growth stages, and maybe adding watering? Something to make the game a little more interactive.) 

If you like the general idea, but have feedback for what could be changed / improved / added upon, I'd love to hear it! And if you notice any bugs, feel free to point those out too :) 

Thanks & I hope you enjoy this tiny garden simulator!

🌻🌼🐝🌼🌻
